projects.title: Smörgåsbord

projects.tech: AngularJS, NodeJS, MongoDB, ExpressJS, Redis, & many others

notes.end: readers that are visual get too crop-happy.
it keeps it's library of feeds updated all day, every day.

images.caption: A Smörgåsbord is a visual mosaic for a fast introduction to the blog's style and other good info.
Smörgåsbord has gone through many iterations and is currently a visual blog profile.
Earlier versions of the site included a feed weight by recency of posts and your own taste.
Users could document their favorite posts by taking 'snapshots'.
Snapshots are framed with the cursor and saved with a click.
Animated sidebar navigation.
Snapshots are saved to your profile and contains links for each article in the mosaic.
